name: Dirt Bike Sketchy Race
description: The race around the world has started! Crank up the gas on your super DIRT BIKE and race through the top hurdles in the world. Each race is a long route through several terrains against many opponents. Race through downtown San Francisco, through the mountains of northern Italy all the way back to the bright. Chose a route and race!
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
